definitions.usage_example: I need to sit down and calm down.
definitions.alternative_example: I need to sit down and relax.

definitions.usage_example: I tried to calm him down, but he was too angry.
definitions.alternative_example: I tried to soothe him, but he was too angry.
definitions.usage_example_es: Intenté calmarlo, pero estaba demasiado enojado.

definitions.usage_example: Hey, calm down! It was just an accident.
definitions.alternative_example: Hey, relax! It was just an accident.
definitions.usage_context_es: orden/decirle a alguien que se relaje
